statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 0 \\ 10 \\ 12 \\ 10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -3 \\ -13 \\ -21 \\ -22 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
